Rolls-Royce boss Warren East has said he is disappointed at the lack of progress on plans to build a series of small nuclear plants.
And he warned the Government: We need to get on with it.

articles.title: Jo Johnson resigns from Binance advisory role - The Guardian
articles.description: The former Tory MP and universities minister stepped back as scrutiny over the cryptocurrency exchange grows
articles.content:
Boris Johnsons younger brother, Jo, has resigned from a role advising Binance, the worlds largest cryptocurrency exchange, which hopes to launch in the UK.
